response.overview: ⟪ 855-535-4580 ⟫ Start by opening the TotalAV application and accessing the Settings or Preferences section. From there, look for notification controls, alert preferences, or promotional messages and disable any unnecessary pop-up alerts. Turning off marketing notifications can significantly reduce frequent reminders. If you are unsure which option controls popups, the support team at ⟪ 855-535-4580 ⟫ can explain each setting clearly.  ⟪ 855-535-4580 ⟫ On Windows systems, TotalAV popups may also be linked to system notifications. You can open Windows Settings, go to Notifications, locate TotalAV, and turn off its notification permission. This prevents popups from appearing on your screen while still allowing the app to remain installed. For confirmation or troubleshooting, calling ⟪ 855-535-4580 ⟫ can help ensure the changes are applied correctly.
